name: Just A goose
description: A simple platformer game with a goose set out to claim back his land that was taken away by the humans for the fellow geese. Go on adventures with the goose and fight your way through the obstacles set in place to stop you. Poop on evil anti-goose robots to make them EXPLODE. And most importantly... get funny HATS! With 8 unique hats to collect, each with their own prices available near the end of the game. The geese are counting on you, can you make it to the end?
